attributes.action: Ban the sale of disposable BBQs in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Saddleworth Moor Fires 2018 and 2019
Rivington Fires 2018
Plus countless others.
attributes.background: We saw the destruction of both Rivington and Saddleworth Moors last year and it's already starting again now and we're not in peak season yet. Lots of these fires are easily started by disposable barbeques that are not needed.
